long_description: A great choice for recreational activities, the glow-in-the-dark BugBand insect repelling band keeps mosquitoes, flies, gnats, no-see-ums and fleas away without the mess of sprays and lotions. Using geraniol, a natural ingredient derived from geranium oil, the wristband emits vapors that form a protective shield around the immediate area. Wristband uses absolutely no DEET. Wristband is effective for up 120 hrs.; when not in use, store the band in the reusable plastic packaging to prolong its active life. Designed for use with all outdoor activities, including swimming. Patented breakaway strap will snap if the wristband becomes entangled. Band can also be fastened to ankles, belt loops, hat bands, pet collars and tents.
short_description: A great choice for recreational activities, the glow-in-the-dark BugBand insect repelling band keeps mosquitoes, flies, gnats, no-see-ums and fleas away without the mess of sprays and lotions.
